title: British journalist held by police at Luton airport for five hours without arrest
dot: digraph G{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10, width=2.5, height=0.75, fixedsize=true, color="#c5e3f6"]; subgraph cluster1{label="Matt Broomfield's Detention";style=dashed;Detained[label="Detained at Luton Airport (24 Aug)"];Questioning[label="Questioned on Reporting & Opinions"];PhoneSeized[label="Phone & Laptop Seized"];DetentionEnd[label="No Criminal Action Followed"];}subgraph cluster2{label="Counter-Terrorism Act 2000";style=dashed;Schedule7[label="Schedule 7 - Terrorism Act"];MaxDetention[label="Up to 6 Hours Detention"];PublicSafety[label="Public Safety vs Harassment Debate"];RoutineUse[label="Routine Use at Airports"];}subgraph cluster3{label="Broader Context & Pressures";style=dotted;KurdishIssue[label="Kurdish Issue & Conflict with Turkey"];MediaWork[label="Broomfield's Work in Kurdish-controlled Syria"];SchengenBan[label="EU Schengen Ban (2021)"];TurkishPressure[label="Pressure from Turkey on UK"];KurdishRepression[label="Repression in Turkey & UK Police Role"];}subgraph cluster4{label="Similar Experiences & Concerns";style=dotted;AliGulOzbek[label="Ali Gul Ozbek - Repeated Stops Since 2012"];AnnMarieDavies[label="Ann Marie Davies - Stop in July (Portugal)"];PoliceTargeting[label="Targeting of British Kurds & Supporters"];NUJ[label="National Union of Journalists (NUJ) Appeal"];}Detained->Questioning->PhoneSeized->DetentionEnd;Schedule7->MaxDetention->PublicSafety->RoutineUse;KurdishIssue->MediaWork->SchengenBan->TurkishPressure->KurdishRepression;AliGulOzbek->PoliceTargeting;AnnMarieDavies->PoliceTargeting;NUJ->PhoneSeized;Detained->Schedule7[label="Detained under"];PhoneSeized->KurdishIssue[label="Journalistic Focus on Kurds"];PoliceTargeting->KurdishRepression[label="Kurdish Repression"];}
